title: bcd-watch: BCD changes (weekly)
description: A feed that summarizes changes to BCD weekly

items.content_html:
BCD Changes Report, Sat Jul 06 2024

Summary of BCD changes from Tuesday, 25 June 2024 to Saturday, 6 July 2024

Added Features: 22

Expand to see the full list...

api

  1. api ➞ HTMLBaseElement ➞ href ➞ forbid_special_characters
  2. api ➞ Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_ethereum
  3. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-contentful-paint
  4. api ➞ PerformancePaintTiming ➞ first-paint
  5. api ➞ createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ from-image
  6. api ➞ createImageBitmap ➞ options_imageOrientation_parameter ➞ none

html

  1. html ➞ manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed

http

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Priority

svg

  1. svg ➞ elements ➞ animate ➞ href
  2. svg ➞ elements ➞ animateMotion ➞ href
  3. svg ➞ elements ➞ animateTransform ➞ href
  4. svg ➞ elements ➞ image ➞ href
  5. svg ➞ elements ➞ linearGradient ➞ href
  6. svg ➞ elements ➞ mpath ➞ href
  7. svg ➞ elements ➞ script ➞ href
  8. svg ➞ elements ➞ set ➞ href

webextensions

  1. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts
  2. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts ➞ register ➞ matchOriginAsFallback
  3. webextensions ➞ api ➞ contentScripts ➞ register ➞ world
  4. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ RegisteredContentScript ➞ matchOriginAsFallback
  5. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ executeScript ➞ world ➞ ISOLATED
  6. webextensions ➞ api ➞ scripting ➞ executeScript ➞ world ➞ MAIN

Removed Features: 63

Expand to see the full list...

api

  1. api ➞ Navigator ➞ registerProtocolHandler ➞ scheme_parameter_etherium

Implementation Status Changes: +7, -0

Added (7)

html

  1. html ➞ manifest ➞ display_override ➞ tabbed
    Added to Chrome  ➞  1 of 3 engines

http

  1. http ➞ headers ➞ Priority
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines

svg

  1. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ fill ➞ context-fill
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  2. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ font-size-adjust
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
  3. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ image-rendering
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  4. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ pointer-events
    Added to Firefox  ➞  3 of 3 engines
  5. svg ➞ global_attributes ➞ stroke ➞ context-stroke
    Added to Chrome  ➞  2 of 3 engines
